thread.title: SUPERAntiSpyware Updated with Windows 10 and Microsoft Edge Support
thread.title_full: SUPERAntiSpyware Updated with Windows 10 and Microsoft Edge Support

title: SUPERAntiSpyware Updated with Windows 10 and Microsoft Edge Support
text: SUPERAntiSpyware Updated with Windows 10 and Microsoft Edge Support Thursday, 24 September 2015 (13 minutes ago) SUPERAntiSpyware version 6.0.1206 is now available for download with improvements for Microsoft’s new operating system, so in case you’ve already upgraded to Windows 10, the app should now work flawlessly on your PC. Basically, the app not only works on Windows 10 but also offers Edge browser cookie detection, thus making sure that no infections land on the computer. The feature package remains just as good as before and includes very advanced options to remove malicious... It’s no secret that Microsoft has a hard time convincing Chinese users to switch to genuine software, but the company has made another important step towards...
